raw_body: SRI RANJAN – PARAMSOTHY,​ FCA – Loving husband of Chandrani (Rita,​ Chandi),​ father of Dr. Mario Ranjeevan (Denmark) and Dr. Johann Kandhipan,​ cherished son of Manonmany and Thambapillai Paramsothy,​ brother of Lekha and brother-in-law of Edmond Paulpillai (UK),​ and brother-in-law of the late Selvaranee (Anne Christine) and the late Rajah Asirwatham and of Pushparani (Cecilia),​ Jeyarani (Irene) and the late V.P. Vedanayagam and Yogarani (Therese) and the late Richmond Paulpillai; passed away peacefully on 2nd March 2024. Viewing on Monday 4th March from 3 p.m. to 9 p.m. and from Tuesday 9 a.m.,​ at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour,​ Borella. Funeral service on Tuesday 5th February 2024 at 4.00 p.m. followed by burial at General Cemetery,​ Kanatta,​ RC Section. Information by Dr. Johann Kandhipan. Tel: 076-686-6870.015635
